response.original_title: Gabe Sapolsky’s Next Evolution: Chris Hero
response.overview: Sit down with Gabe and the sensational Chris Hero and let them take you inside the matches they put together. Join this journey inside the ascension of Hero’s career, right up to his jump over to becoming Kassius Ohno. See what made the Chris the indie sensation he was!  Hero versus… -Hidaka -Fish -Galloway -Thatcher
response.title: Gabe Sapolsky’s Next Evolution: Chris Hero
